SELECT tp.id, tp.day_id, tp.title, tp.start_at, tp.end_at, tp.place_name, tp.address, tp.lat, tp.lng, tp.expected_cost FROM plan_places tp INNER JOIN plan_days td ON tp.day_id = td.id WHERE td.plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY td.day_index ASC, tp.start_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_places (day_id, title, start_at, end_at, place_name, address, lat, lng, expected_cost) VALUES (#{dayId}, #{title}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{placeName}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{expectedCost})
mapper.update: UPDATE plan_places SET day_id = #{dayId}, title = #{title}, start_at = #{startAt}, end_at = #{endAt}, place_name = #{placeName}, address = #{address}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng}, expected_cost = #{expectedCost} WHERE id = #{id}
